name: Video Downloader for FB
description: What news for version 1.7.x *** Discover New feature: Copy Video Link from Facebook app to download directly.  Video Downloader for FB is the easiest Video Downloader app to download and save videos from FB. Video Downloader for FB allows you to browse through your face book account, your news feed and your friends/pages walls using a built-in browser that allows you to select the video you want to download and save them so you can watch it later and share it with your friends via different apps.  How to use:  Click on Browse Facebook.  Login and browse your wall.  Play the video you want to download.  Click yes to download video.  You can share it on your facebook, for instagram, for vimeo etc.  You can manager your video and play again everytime and everywhere.  Features for FB Video Downloader: 1. Easy to use. 2. Safe & light weight. 3. Allows you to save videos to watch them later. Install Video Downloader for FB and start downloading videos from Facebook now!
